data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Diyala, Iraq.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Diyala, Iraq
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Diyala who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Please, teach the 2,504 believers in Diyala, Iraq how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,504 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Deaf people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Diyala.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Diyala, Iraq.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Diyala with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
